text:
Nike Men's Air Jordan 1 Low Sneaker

Description:
Nike Men's Air Jordan 1 Low Sneaker

Classic Nike fresh white high tops for under $80!$?, $0LD. GR8 DEAL AND COOL LOOK. FOR STEPPIN OUT ON DRY DAYS ON SIDEWALKS AND INDOORS. YOU DONT WEAR THESE WHEN THE WEATHER SUCKS OR ON GRASS. THEY DIE THAT DAY OR YOU ROCK EM A DOZEN PLUS TIMES FRESH WHITE WITH CARE.

I love the court visions because how wide and comfortable they are. I have several pairs of Jordans but these are my daily wearers so I dont shuff up all my super expensive shoes, wear very loose and have multiple pairs to stay color coordinated. Great shoes.

Came new, true to size husband loved em.

They fit great really  comfortable

Got for my son, he says they are very comfortable and stylish, I like the old skool look, fast delivery and quality you can expect....5 stars

I had the old version of this before they were pushing the recycled materials angle, and I can‚Äôt tell if they are the exact same or not. They are hard to break in and not comfortable at first around the ankle etc, and while I could wear low socks with my old ones, I need higher socks to avoid heel ankle chafing and such with these. Hopefully they break in and feel like the old court vision mid model.

ESTOS SON LOS UNICOS TENIS QUE USA MI ESPOSO  LOS COMPRO SIEMPRE

Great quality

Husband likes them! He was looking for something more comfortable then his steel toe boots while traveling and these were a hit!

Brought these for my son he like them they fit perfect ü©µüî•

Ho visto questo modello che non avevo mai avuto, ed abituato ad indossare modelli Jordan simili o comunque Nike ho voluto provarle. Arrivate nei tempi dichiarati, mi posso ritenere abbastanza soddisfatto.All'inizio erano molto rigide, ma indossandole un po' di volte si son quasi del tutto ammorbidite. Avevo il dubbio se ordinare  numero 45 o 46, ho scelto il 46. Forse son un p√≤ "abbondanti" come numero, 45 sarebbe stato meglio.

Est√°n bien pero las tuve que de pobre por la talla, sin embargo la calidad no me pareci√≥ del nivel de nike, pero debe ser mi impresi√≥n, he comprado m√°s cosas y siempre satisfecho.

Dopo 3 mesetti gi√† cominciano a rompersi

Die Schuhe wurden schon mal wo anders verschickt, die Aufkleber in Sohle fehlten

Hopefully they break in and feel like the old court vision mid model.
